verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֬רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm רָצִ֣יתָ <S%H7521><s%> thou hast been favourable יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <S%H776><s%> unto thy land שַׁ֝֗בְתָּ <S%H7725><s%> thou hast brought back [שְׁבוּת כ] (שְׁבִ֣ית <S%H7622><s%> captive ק) יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

נָ֭שָׂאתָ <S%H5375><s%> Thou hast forgiven עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people כִּסִּ֖יתָ <S%H3680><s%> thou hast covered כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטָּאתָ֣ם <S%H2403><s%> all their sin סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אָסַ֥פְתָּ <S%H622><s%> Thou hast taken away כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5678><s%> all thy wrath הֱ֝שִׁיב֗וֹתָ <S%H7725><s%> thou hast turned מֵחֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> [thyself] from the fierceness אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H639><s%> of thine anger

שׁ֭וּבֵנוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> us O God יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <S%H3468><s%> of our salvation וְהָפֵ֖ר <S%H6565><s%> toward us to cease כַּֽעַסְךָ֣ <S%H3708><s%> and cause thine anger עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> toward

הַלְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> alway תֶּֽאֱנַף־ <S%H599><s%> Wilt thou be angry בָּ֑נוּ תִּמְשֹׁ֥ךְ <S%H4900><s%> continue אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <S%H639><s%> thine anger לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> to all וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> to all

הֲֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> Yourself תָּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> us again תְּחַיֵּ֑נוּ <S%H2421><s%> Wilt thou not revive וְ֝עַמְּךָ֗ <S%H5971><s%> that thy people יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> may rejoice בָֽךְ׃
הַרְאֵ֣נוּ <S%H7200><s%> Shew יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> us thy mercy וְ֝יֶשְׁעֲךָ֗ <S%H3468><s%> us thy salvation תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and grant לָֽנוּ׃

אֶשְׁמְעָ֗ה <S%H8085><s%> I will hear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יְדַבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> will speak הָאֵ֪ל ׀ <S%H410><s%> what God יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for יְדַבֵּ֬ר <S%H1696><s%> for he will speak שָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his חֲסִידָ֑יו <S%H2623><s%> and to his saints וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> but let them not turn again לְכִסְלָֽה׃ <S%H3690><s%> to folly

אַ֤ךְ ׀ <S%H389><s%> Surely קָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] nigh לִירֵאָ֣יו <S%H3373><s%> them that fear יִשְׁע֑וֹ <S%H3468><s%> Surely his salvation לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <S%H7931><s%> may dwell כָּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> him that glory בְּאַרְצֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H776><s%> in our land

חֶֽסֶד־ <S%H2617><s%> Mercy וֶאֱמֶ֥ת <S%H571><s%> and truth נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6298><s%> are met together צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness וְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> and peace נָשָֽׁקוּ׃ <S%H5401><s%> have kissed

אֱ֭מֶת <S%H571><s%> Truth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תִּצְמָ֑ח <S%H6779><s%> shall spring out וְ֝צֶ֗דֶק <S%H6664><s%> and righteousness מִשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven נִשְׁקָֽף׃ <S%H8259><s%> shall look down

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Indeed יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yea the LORD יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> shall give הַטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that which is] good וְ֝אַרְצֵ֗נוּ <S%H776><s%> and our land תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall yield יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <S%H2981><s%> her increase

צֶ֭דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Righteousness לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before יְהַלֵּ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall go וְיָשֵׂ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> him and shall set לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [us] in the way פְּעָמָֽיו׃ <S%H6471><s%> of his steps
